Text: Thank you Ekolb for sharing this wonderful three-part series. Happy 2010 year!
I ordered the DVD from PBS and was going to wait for the DVD delivery to watch it, but now I can watch it sooner.  Thanks for sharing. You are too kind!
Excellent topic- the mind is so powerful and with knowledge we can better direct it. Namaste, Ekoib.
This is very informative and helps those of us that suffer from chronic depression.  Bravo and thanks again for the up.
